attributes.action: ask lord Kerr to resign after his announcement to break a democratic Brexit Vote
attributes.additional_details: Sky news reports and his own admission of trying to block the will of his own country and in favour of Europe is undemocratic and countrary to the government will enacting the will of the people after a binding referendum vote. Largest ever recorded in British History which is binding.
attributes.background: After his announcement today stating to try revert article 50 he is in contempt of his own country and democratic process which was binding in article 50 and written in law after we leave the European Union 🇪🇺 March 2019

rejection.details: The resignation of a member of the House of Lords would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
